Okay, guys, I'm here to clarify a few things, and to explain how I fixed the "episodes out of order" issue.
First of all, not everything shown in the "in the next episode" bit, at the very end of each episode, actually happens in the next episode. Some of it is actually wrapped up IN that bit, instead of further concluded or continued in the following episode.

As for the issue everyone has been having, THE EPISODES *ARE* IN FACT IN THE PROPER ORDER!! CONFIRMED BY BOTH NETFLIX AND IMDB!!
***All I did was move all of the subtitle files to a different folder, and voila!*** Before I moved the subtitles, it was not playing the episode I clicked on. I would attribute this to the fact that the subtitles have to have the same name as each episode, but some glitch must have happened. Either way, I don't really give a shit. This is what worked for me, so please stop whining.

To RiddlerA: Excellent upload buddy! Thanks a ton!
Oh, and, MANDARP, knock off the comment spam bro. 5 comments in a row is unnecessary.

A heads-up, the subtitles are completely out of sync, at least on the 1st season.

And the episodes names are mixed up.

Charity Drive = Visiting Ours

My Mother The Car = In God We Trust

Missing Kitty = Alter Egos

Some of you are commenting on the in last episode and next episode discrepancies compared to what actually happened or what is shown. The show schedule was reduced as it was it was being aired during the second and third season. I began to think I missed something. I think they just cut episodes out of the season to shorten it all together.

For those wondering if the episodes are in the correct order, I found this on wikipedia: 

The episodes below are listed by the order on the DVD and not their original broadcast order, as there are three instances where Fox aired the episodes out of chronological order.

What is this crap? 

- The video quality is HORRIBLE: 389kbps. That's the bitrate of a high quality MP3.

- The subtitle FPS is out of sync, not to mention offset.

If you like to watch your shows at least in standard quality, stay the hell away form this torrent.
